name: Lovely Planet
description: A First Person Shooter Gun Ballet set in a cutesy abstract world. Jump and shoot your way through five worlds full of treacherous enemies with your trusty semi-automatic!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2, 7 or 8 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB, Shader Model 2.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse Recommended
